nodes.bodyText: Are there any left? Could this class be removed?

I think you are missing several events, in which the routes do get refreshed.
Compare with cases in
org.springframework.cloud.netflix.zuul.ZuulServerAutoConfiguration.ZuulRefreshListener#onApplicationEvent
This name should describe more closely what this object does. It is not a listener, it's load balancer registry ... In other pieces of code it looks weird.
Sonar has some good suggestions about these Thread.sleep(). I would implement them.
